effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
